answer: In receiving local or out-of-town items whether for credit or collection, FIRST AMERICAN NATIONAL BANK acts only as agent and will not be liable for loss in transit or for misconduct, negligence, or other default of sub-agents, who shall be deemed agents of depositor. All credits given for such items are conditional, subject to be charged back to depositor's account, if not collected, also all items drawn on this bank and not good at close of business on day of deposit. Right is reserved and the bank is authorized to forward items for collection of payment direct to the drawee or payor bank or through any other bank at its discretion and to receive payment in drafts drawn by the drawee or other bank, and except for negligence, this bank shall not be liable for dishonor of the drafts so received in payment nor for losses thereon. Nashville items are to be handled subject to final payment through the Nashville Clearing House.
